item.title: Get SP item ID
item.description:
Sometimes in script you would like to for example write something to an excel file using graph api - for this purpose you will need to know a file ID - as you cannot just specify a file path..

here’s how to

In my example we are going to get an ID of this file:

first we need to know a sharepoint site ID, there is a few options to get this, I like the simple one
